# Gun deaths by age

We have data about 100798 individuals killed by guns. Only 15687 are older than 65. The distribution of the remainder is shown below:


::: {.cell layout-align="center" hash='gun-deaths_cache/html/youth-dist_09cc2f40f728a73c2e3465ddb06aae33'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](gun-deaths_files/figure-html/youth-dist-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%}
:::
:::


# Gun deaths by race


::: {.cell layout-align="center" hash='gun-deaths_cache/html/race-dist_065bcacb52953f757a3f0696cf7494be'}

```{.r .cell-code}
youth |>
  ggplot(aes(fct_infreq(race) |> fct_rev())) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(x = "Victim race")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](gun-deaths_files/figure-html/race-dist-1.png){fig-align='center' width=80%}
:::
:::
